const response = await client.indices.create({
  index: "stop_example",
  settings: {
    analysis: {
      filter: {
        english_stop: {
          type: "stop",
          stopwords: "_english_",
        },
      },
      analyzer: {
        rebuilt_stop: {
          tokenizer: "lowercase",
          filter: ["english_stop"],
        },
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
